actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
short_title: Tuition Relief for Students Act of 2013

summary.text: Tuition Relief for Students Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2017 the tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.

titles.title: Tuition Relief for Students Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
